item.description: Mugukboyangtm is composed of 8 kinds of acupuncture points. Including the both side of body, 12 points for men and 13 points for women.

item.title: Traditional Medicine which make you healthy
item.description: In 2008, TV showed an 93 old aged man who vigorously asserted he was in very good health condition at his age because he burned moxa on the appointed spot of skin on a regular basis - one time a day.
